thread.title: Bernie Sanders blesses meme lovers with a poster-sized Trump tweet
thread.title_full: Bernie Sanders blesses meme lovers with a poster-sized Trump tweet

author: Chloe Bryan
title: Bernie Sanders blesses meme lovers with a poster-sized Trump tweet
text:
It's the circle of life, guys: Bernie Sanders printed a Donald Trump tweet on a poster board and brought it to the Senate floor, so the internet is making weird memes out of it.
Sanders used the big, big printout to remind the Senate ‚Äî which is currently debating repealing the Affordable Care Act ‚Äî that, before joining the presidential race, Trump promised not to cut Medicare, Medicaid or Social Security.
SEE ALSO: Donald Trump trusts WikiLeaks more than the CIA or FBI
Here is that tweet (which is still up, by the way).
I was the first & only potential GOP candidate to state there will be no cuts to Social Security, Medicare & Medicaid. Huckabee copied me.
‚Äî Donald J. Trump (@realDonaldTrump) May 7, 2015
And here is the Vermont senator with that tweet, made flesh with ink and foam board, on the Senate floor.
Image: C-Span
Perhaps he knew that bringing a tweet poster to Congress would get his point some attention. Perhaps he was accommodating those Senators who did not bring their glasses that day. But whatever he thought would happen, he gave Twitter a blank canvas on which to Photoshop.
And Photoshop it did. Here are a few highlights.
pic.twitter.com/s06eni9A8u
‚Äî president-elect evan (@evcon) January 4, 2017
pic.twitter.com/tKEjLNawwV
‚Äî Maggie Serota üéÖüèª (@maggieserota) January 4, 2017
pic.twitter.com/Rla32WxJV7
‚Äî Four Pins (@Four_Pins) January 4, 2017
Bernie Sanders, everyone. (h/t @weareyourfek for the idea) pic.twitter.com/MpepvAwgIe
‚Äî Annie Colbert (@anniecolbert) January 4, 2017
. @paleofuture pic.twitter.com/W8fKtNnTj6
‚Äî Hellscape Legoman (@HapaxLegoman) January 4, 2017
bernie continues to speak truth to power pic.twitter.com/dpLQx8nBzr
‚Äî David Mack (@davidmackau) January 4, 2017
wow I can't believe bernie went there pic.twitter.com/ecgtieZMLm
‚Äî Gabe Bergado (@gabebergado) January 4, 2017
May the United States Senate have many more viral days like this one.
BONUS: Watch Joe Biden get snubbed by a baby
